title: Strictly Neil Jones' awkward reaction to moment Katya says she wants to kiss Mike
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Strictly Come Dancing stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Strictly star and professional dancer Neil Jones was caught out by viewers with his awkward reaction to the moment estranged wife Katya said she wanted to kiss Mike Bushell .

Katya was left incredibly emotional last night after she and BBC presenter Mike wowed the judges with their performance.

After receiving a nine from judge Motsi Mabuse, Katya couldn't contain the tears as they hugged tightly.

As an inconsolable Katya was asked by Claudia Winkleman if she was alright, Mike kissed her on the cheek.

Grabbing him around the neck, she squealed: "I want to kiss him so much! He worked so hard!"

But eagle-eyed fans noticed the reaction on Neil Jones' face in response to Katya's cringeworthy comment.

(Image: DIGITAL/EROTEME.CO.UK)

(Image: Twitter)

One tweeted: "Katya - 'I wanna kiss him'. Neil - #Strictly," with a picture of the professional's face which was left stunned as he stood beside fellow contestants.

Many other fans agreed with the original tweet, adding "the best tweeeeeet everr!"

And in reaction to Katya's kissing comment, other fans were left baffled and took to Twitter to share their opinions.

(Image: BBC)

(Image: PA)

One tweeted: "Did Katya just say she wanted to kiss him?!! #notAgain!!! #Strictly."

While another commented: "That was all a bit awks with Katya. “I want to kiss him” and all those tears. Was that about the dancing ? #Strictly."

"Katya 'I could kiss him' yeah...maybe not the best comment #Strictly," another quipped.

One remarked: "Better not kiss him Katya... Just to be safe #Strictly."

*Strictly Come Dancing returns tonight on BBC One
description: Katya Jones' estranged husband was caught out by viewers with awkward reaction when she said she wanted to kiss Mike Bushell
